item.title: 16 agreements signed during Modi's Israel visit
item.summary: Netanyahu described the Indian PM's visit as short but very productive. Agreements cover tech, agriculture, water, and health sectors.
item.author: Ariel Whitman

item.title: Jensen Huang to visit Israel in April
item.summary: Nvidia CEO will meet with nearly 6,000 employees in Israel. Company's Israeli workforce continues rapid growth.
item.author: Assaf Gilead
